attributes.action: ensure that all waiting rooms in doctors' and dentists' surgeries have sufficient lifestyle guidance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ensure that the prevention message is clearly stated in a positive manner on posters, leaflets, booklets and magazines in all waiting rooms.
Correct eating and exercise and the avoidance of drugs lead to good health in most cases. This simple prevention message is not clearly visible in typical waiting rooms, yet there is adequate material available to surgeries.
The simple message that "prevention is better than cure" needs to be emphasized in waiting rooms.  Encouraging informative and interesting health videos for patients to watch should reduce stress and encourage a positive attitude to health.
